title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9.17 - Executive Order No. 17: Continuing the Declaration of Disaster Emergency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9.17 - Executive Order No. 17: Continuing the Declaration of Disaster Emergency

State Regulations
WHEREAS, pursuant to Executive Order 211, issued July
6,2021, a statewide disaster was declared across the State due to gun
violence; NOW, THEREFORE, I, KATHY HOCHUL, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and

Article 2-B of the Executive Law, do hereby extend the state disaster emergency
as set forth in Executive Order 211, as continued in Executive Order 3.11, and
continue the terms, conditions, and suspensions contained in Executive Order
211, until October 18, 2022. GIVEN under my hand and the Privy Seal of the State in the

City of Albany this eighteenth day of September in the year two thousand
twenty-two

Signed: Kathy Hochul

Dated: September 18, 2022

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
